com.vangav.backend.math

Class Range

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.math.Range

  • public class Range
extends java.lang.Object
    Range represents a numerical range from min to max inclusive [min ... max]

      • getIntersection

        public Range getIntersection(Range range)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        getIntersection
        Parameters:
        range -
        Returns:
        a Range representing the intersection of this range and param range - if both ranges are invalid return an invalid range - if one range is invalid return the other valid range - if both ranges don't overlap return an invalid range - else return a new Range Object reflecting the intersection of this range and param range
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getUniion

        public Range getUniion(Range range)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        getUniion
        Parameters:
        range -
        Returns:
        a Range representing the union of this range and param range - if both ranges are invalid return an invalid range - if one range is invalid return the other valid range - else return a new Range Object reflecting the union of this range and param range
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
